column4: I have an HP Mini netbook that will only take 1G RAM and I'd like to install ubuntu and have it dual boot. It currently has Windows 7.
I have downloaded the 9.04 netbook remix and the 11.04 iso.
Isn't an iso for burning a CD?
Can't do much with it on the netbook. Don't most netbooks not have CDRs?
use a usb stick with unetbootin
une is no more 11.04 does it by default now
